World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 3 月 15 日星期五 19:15:11 GMT 120
Independent vote monitor says Russian elections are 'most secret' everThe head of an independent vote-monitoring group that Russia has labelled a "foreign agent" says the presidential election that began on Friday and is widely expected to re-elect Vladimir Putin is the least transparent the country has seen. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 17:48:48 GMT 4TQJXOO435OETBIUW2OWX56Q3U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/independent-vote-monitor-says- Russian-elections-are-most-secret-ever-2024-03-15/Mark Trevelyan, Gleb Stolyarov世界欧洲
Abstention by far-right in Azores raises hopes for Portugal's new governmentPortugal's far-right Chega party abstained on Friday from voting on the Social Democratic Party's (PSD) minority government policy programme in the Azores islands, thereby letting it pass, a move PSD hopes Chega will replicate nationwide after last weekend's inconclusive election. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 17:43:57 GMT ZE2LIQJFJVPS7KO72K4P2KJMGU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/abstention-by-far-right-azores-raises-hopes-portugal-new-government-2024-03-15/Sergio Goncalves世界欧洲
Canada's Trudeau says he often mulls quitting his 'crazy job,' but will stay onCanadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, whose Liberals are trailing badly in the polls, on Friday said he thought about quitting his "crazy job" every day but insisted he would stay in office until the next election. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 17:35:12 GMT GV2NLGU7TJJEPJQXC7PCYANJ7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/canada-trudeau-says-he-often-muls-quitting-his-crazy-job-will-stay-2024-03-15/Reuters世界美洲
UN chief condemns Russia bid to hold presidential poll in occupied UkraineSecretary-General Antonio Guterres has condemned Russian efforts to conduct its presidential election in occupied areas of Ukraine, a U.N spokesperson said on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 17:13:30 GMT II3V4AJY5FLKXHEPAZLKW266YM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/un-chief-condemns-Russia-bid-hold-presidential-poll-occupied-ukraine-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Beirut says French plan for Lebanon-Israel truce could be 'step' to stabilityLebanon sees a French proposal meant to end hostilities with Israel and settle a border dispute as a possible "significant step" towards peace, according to a letter by Lebanon's foreign ministry dated Friday and seen by Reuters. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 17:07:03 GMT DHPTIOHPL5JPPNM5C5VXDJO4G4 https://www.reuters.com/world/beirut-says-french-plan-lebanon-israeli-truce-could-be-step-stability-2024-03-15/Reuters世界
Polish opposition leader refuses to tell all to phone-hacking commissionThe leader of Poland's largest opposition party said on Friday he would refuse to tell everything he knows to a parliamentary commission investigating allegations of phone-hacking when his party was in power. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 16:37:54 GMT L3OF74V2VNMCZJA7NACRAL64ZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-opposition-leader-refuses-to-tell-all-phone-hacking-commission-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Croatian president to run for more powerful PM's post in April electionCroatian President Zoran Milanovic on Friday set April 17 for a parliamentary election and said he would run for the more powerful post of prime minister after dissolving parliament in the small European Union country. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 16:34:41 GMT VFXY55JMRVJVJB3I5W5EDQEMIE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/croatian-president-run-more-powerful-pms-post-april-election-2024-03-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Most of the parties for Haiti's transition council have named representatives, Blinken saysMost of the parties for Haiti's transition council have named their representative but a couple still have yet to do so, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Friday, as the Caribbean nation faces a political and humanitarian crisis. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 16:32:55 GMT HLQLV5SQAVNRVHUOFOVCW76F7E https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/most-parties-haiti-transition-council-have-named-representatives-blinking-says-2024-03-15/Humeyra Pamuk, Daphne Psaledakis世界美洲
In Gaza, Palestinians hold Ramadan prayers by ruins of mosquePalestinians in Gaza held the first Friday prayers of Ramadan outside the ruins of a mosque levelled in Israel's offensive, one of hundreds the Hamas-run authorities say have been damaged or destroyed in Israeli attacks since October. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 16:24:46 GMT GNEBVOQBGFKEFDOXLFEDMHIALQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-palestinians-hold-ramadan-prayers-by-ruined-mosque-2024-03-15/Reuters世界中东地区
Biden says Schumer's concerns on Israel shared by many AmericansPresident Joe Biden said on Friday that U.S. Senator Chuck Schumer echoed the concerns of many Americans when he called for new elections in Israel and harshly criticized Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu as an obstacle to peace. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 16:05:09 GMT JTH7MS7WRNML5MW3MHSD6E5LFY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/biden-says-schumers-concerns-israel-are-shared-by-many-americans-2024-03-15/Jarrett Renshaw, Kanishka Singh世界美国
Congo lifts moratorium on death penalty, justice ministry circular showsDemocratic Republic Congo has lifted a moratorium on the death penalty, citing treachery and espionage in recurring armed conflicts as the reason for allowing a resumption of executions, said a justice ministry circular seen by Reuters on Friday. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 15:38:48 GMT 2WJYNRM5WRPF3FZUX5X2YQ3WSE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-lifts-death-penalty-moratorium-justice-ministry-circular-shows-2024-03-15/Reuters世界非洲
